title: Meeting Reminder
content: Don't forget the meeting with Kim Kitsuragi at 3 PM.
Check the evidence folder before attending.

title: Shopping List
content: Buy milk, eggs, and bread.
Pick up some coffee if there’s time.

title: Dream Log — The Alley
content: I saw the same alley again last night. The same flickering light, the same hum beneath the pavement.
It feels like it’s calling to me, though I can’t tell why.

title: Library Pass
content: Borrowed from the old archives downtown.
Valid until next Friday. Don’t lose it this time.

title: Crumpled Letter
content: ‘You were right about the fog. It wasn’t weather at all.’
No signature. The handwriting looks rushed, but familiar.

title: Train Ticket Stub
content: Destination: Castalén Central.
Departure time smeared beyond recognition.
Why would I keep this?

title: Old Newspaper Clipping
content: Headline: ‘Mysterious blackout affects entire district.’
Date missing. The photo shows a street I recognize.

title: Note from My Desk
content: Someone wrote on the corner of my desk in pencil: ‘Stop looking.’
The handwriting isn’t mine.

title: Unfinished Poem
content: The ink fades halfway through the line.
‘…and when the rain forgot our names, we—’
No ending.

title: Field Sketch
content: A quick drawing of the northern pier, annotated with ‘light source unknown’.
Graphite smudged at the edges. Possibly mine.

title: Diary — Day 1
content: Arrived at the motel. The room smells of salt and old carpet.
Left the recorder by the window. I can hear the gulls even now.

title: Diary — Day 2
content: Rain all morning. No sign of her.
The clerk downstairs says the phone lines cut out again last night.

title: Scrap of Map
content: Shows only a few streets, none I recognize.
There’s a red X near the bottom margin.

title: Receipt from Unknown Café
content: Total: 0.00 — someone paid for me?
The timestamp reads 03:07 AM.

title: Postcard from Nowhere
content: No return address. The image shows a coastline under violet clouds.
The message: ‘You’ll understand soon.’
